<span data-ttu-id="60e41-103">Vhod všetkým používateľom Outlook.com filtrovanie malware a spam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="60e41-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="60e41-104">Pre predplatiteľov služieb Office 365 Home a Office 365 Personal, Outlook.com vykonáva extra skríning príloh a odkazov v prijatých správ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="60e41-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="60e41-105">Ďalšie informácie, prečítajte si [Rozšírené Outlook.com zabezpečenia pre predplatiteľov služieb Office 365](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="60e41-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Office 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="60e41-106">Ak chcete zapnúť alebo vypnúť bezpečné prepojenia, ísť do vášho [poistného zabezpečenia nastavenia](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="60e41-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
